1457230.name: Melrose Café
1457230.description:
Welcome to Melrose Café!
Grab a coffee and have a seat!

Working alone can sometimes feel isolating. Melrose Café is the place for you to set your mind in a working mood and focus on getting things done but not alone!.

Melrose Café is an online space where people from all around the world can find a spot and get to work!

Always Open, Always Online

Melrose Café is open 24hrs and uses one persistent world so make sure to grab a spot if you find one!

Music to help you focus

The café has also sorts of beats to help you focus on your tasks. Really get in the mood to work while you're at the café!

Your feedback is important

Melrose Café is an evolving experience that your feedback can have a big effect on. Jump into our Discord and let us know what you wish you had and any bugs you might encounter (Sorry!).
1457230.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
